alert.note: Alert for Brown; Holt; Rock; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 8:42PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT ROCK...LOUP...SOUTHEASTERN BROWN...GARFIELD...SOUTHERN HOLT...NORTHEASTERN BLAINE AND NORTHWESTERN WHEELER COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM CDT... At 841 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Newport to 10 miles east of Brewster. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... O`Neill, Burwell, Bassett, Brewster, Atkinson, Chambers, Page, Newport, Rose, Amelia, Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area, Inman, Emmet, Fox Bayou, Almeria Meadow State Wildlife Management Area, Virginia Smith Dam, Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area, Carson Lake and Duff. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 126 and 182. Highway 20 between mile markers 255 and 273, and between mile markers 284 and 320. Highway 281 between mile markers 156 and 188. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
